channel.title: Objective-See's Blog
channel.description: All Things Related to Mac Security

item.title: TCCing is Believing: Apple finally adds TCC events to Endpoint Security!
item.description: Apple will bring TCC events to Endpoint Security in macOS 15.4. In this post, we covers details, nuances, and provide PoC code for the new 'ES_EVENT_TYPE_NOTIFY_TCC_MODIFY' event.

item.title: Leaking Passwords (and more!) on macOS
item.description: In this guest blog post, researcher Noah Gregory shares the technical details of a bug he uncovered (that was subsequently patched by Apple as CVE-2024-5447).

item.title: The Mac Malware of 2024
item.description: It's here! Our annual report on all the Mac malware of the year (2024 edition). Besides providing samples for download, we cover infection vectors, persistence mechanisms, payloads and more!

item.title: Restoring Reflective Code Loading on macOS
item.description: Apple silently 'broke' in-memory code loading on macOS ...let's restore it!
